018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.HashSet;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Optional;
026import java.util.Set;
027import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpAddCpu;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpDelCpu;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpQueryHotpluggableCpus;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ConfigureQemu;
031import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.CpuAdded;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.CpuDeleted;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.HotpluggableCpuResult;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
037import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
038
039/**
040 * The Class CpuController.
041 */
042@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
043public class CpuController extends Component {
044
045    private Integer currentCpus;
046    private Integer desiredCpus;
047    private ConfigureQemu suspendedConfigure;
048
049    /**
050     * Instantiates a new CPU controller.
051     *
052     * @param componentChannel the component channel
053     * @param monitor the monitor
054     */
055    public CpuController(Channel componentChannel) {
056        super(componentChannel);
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * On configure qemu.
061     *
062     * @param event the event
063     */
064    @Handler
065    public void onConfigureQemu(ConfigureQemu event) {
066        Optional.ofNullable(event.configuration().vm.currentCpus)
067            .ifPresent(cpus -> {
068                if (desiredCpus != null && desiredCpus.equals(cpus)) {
069                    return;
070                }
071                event.suspendHandling();
072                suspendedConfigure = event;
073                desiredCpus = cpus;
074                fire(new MonitorCommand(new QmpQueryHotpluggableCpus()));
075            });
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * On monitor result.
080     *
081     * @param result the result
082     */
083    @Handler
084    public void onHotpluggableCpuResult(HotpluggableCpuResult result) {
085        // Sort
086        List<ObjectNode> used = new ArrayList<>();
087        List<ObjectNode> unused = new ArrayList<>();
088        for (var itr = result.values().iterator(); itr.hasNext();) {
089            ObjectNode cpu = (ObjectNode) itr.next();
090            if (cpu.has("qom-path")) {
091                used.add(cpu);
092            } else {
093                unused.add(cpu);
094            }
095        }
096        currentCpus = used.size();
097        if (desiredCpus == null) {
098            return;
099        }
100        // Process
101        int diff = used.size() - desiredCpus;
102        diff = addCpus(used, unused, diff);
103        deleteCpus(used, diff);
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * On cpu added.
108     *
109     * @param event the event
110     */
111    @Handler
112    public void onCpuAdded(CpuAdded event) {
113        currentCpus += 1;
114        checkCpus();
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * On cpu deleted.
119     *
120     * @param event the event
121     */
122    @Handler
123    public void onCpuDeleted(CpuDeleted event) {
124        currentCpus -= 1;
125        checkCpus();
126    }
127
128    private void checkCpus() {
129        if (suspendedConfigure != null && desiredCpus != null
130            && currentCpus == desiredCpus.intValue()) {
131            suspendedConfigure.resumeHandling();
132            suspendedConfigure = null;
133        }
134    }
135
136    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
137    private int addCpus(List<ObjectNode> used, List<ObjectNode> unused,
138            int diff) {
139        Set<String> usedIds = new HashSet<>();
140        for (var cpu : used) {
141            String qomPath = cpu.get("qom-path").asText();
142            if (qomPath.startsWith("/machine/peripheral/cpu-")) {
143                usedIds
144                    .add(qomPath.substring(qomPath.lastIndexOf('/') + 1));
145            }
146        }
147        int nextId = 1;
148        while (diff < 0 && !unused.isEmpty()) {
149            String id;
150            do {
151                id = "cpu-" + nextId++;
152            } while (usedIds.contains(id));
153            fire(new MonitorCommand(new QmpAddCpu(unused.get(0), id)));
154            unused.remove(0);
155            diff += 1;
156        }
157        return diff;
158    }
159
160    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
161    private int deleteCpus(List<ObjectNode> used, int diff) {
162        while (diff > 0 && !used.isEmpty()) {
163            ObjectNode cpu = used.remove(0);
164            String qomPath = cpu.get("qom-path").asText();
165            if (!qomPath.startsWith("/machine/peripheral/cpu-")) {
166                continue;
167            }
168            String id = qomPath.substring(qomPath.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
169            fire(new MonitorCommand(new QmpDelCpu(id)));
170            diff -= 1;
171        }
172        return diff;
173    }
174}
